# validate(url:)

**Type Method**

Validates the AIVU file given its URL. It throws an error message with error details, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
static func validate(url: URL) async throws -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The url of an AIVU file to be validated.

## Discussion
